name: Post Office (co6op13)
description:
Management :

1 player WASD or arrows + space;

2 player on gamepad.

On the left, new parcels arrive from other places. On the right, you need to bring parcels to be sent to other places.

Two lines of clients. The first turn to come to receive parcels. The second is to send parcels.

Spaghetti code. https://github.com/Co6op13/LostRelicJam

Sorry for my English.

Used assets :
